testCase.name: SNS publish should publish a message
SNS publish should publish a string message
SNS publish should publish a message eith MessageType
DynamodbAdapter put should successfully put an item in DynamoDB
DynamodbAdapter update should successfully update an item in DynamoDB
DynamodbAdapter query should query an item woth successfull
SQSAdapter deleteMessage should successfully resolve promise and delete message from SQS
SQSAdapter deleteMessage should raise an error when the promise is rejected
SQSAdapter sendMessage should successfully resolve promise and send message to SQS
SQSAdapter sendMessage should raise an error when the promise is rejected
SSMAdapter getJsonParameter should successfully resolve promise and retrieved parameters
SSMAdapter getJsonParameter it should raise exception while failing to parse invalid JSON
SSMAdapter getStringParameter() should successfully resolve promise and retrieve STRING parameter
SSMAdapter getParameter should raise an error when the promise is rejected
SSMAdapter getParameter should raise an error when the value is an empty string
SSMAdapter getParameter should raise an error when the value is undefined
